content: A new Neighbor, Mr. <color=#8AAB4B>Dorjelang</color>, has just completed the relocation to Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>! May <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> grow ever more prosperous and lively.
Breaking news! This just in — The Parade Info Hub has spotted <style=Highlight>a bundle of hats</style> hurtling toward Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>—
{短暂停}What?! It's already made planetfall? C-Could it be...

A new Neighbor, Ms. <color=#8AAB4B>Medowlyn</color>, has just completed the relocation to Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>! May <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> grow ever more prosperous and lively.
Breaking news! This just in — The Parade Info Hub has spotted a <style=Highlight>seemingly apple-shaped object</style> drifting toward Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>—
Breaking news! This just in — The Parade Info Hub has observed <style=Highlight>a mysterious beetle</style> heading straight for Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>—
{短暂停}What?! It's already made planetfall? C-Could it be...
{短暂停}What?! It's already made planetfall? C-Could it be...

A new Neighbor, Mr. <color=#8AAB4B>Bhadra</color>, has just completed the relocation to Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>! May <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> grow ever more prosperous and lively.
Breaking news! This just in — The Parade Info Hub has observed a <style=Highlight>snowy-white yarn ball</style> blown toward Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> by the winds—
{短暂停} What?! It's already made planetfall? C-Could it be...
{短暂停}What?! It's already made planetfall? C-Could it be...

A new Neighbor, Mr. <color=#8AAB4B>Isaki</color>, has just completed the relocation to Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>! May <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> grow ever more prosperous and lively.

A new Neighbor, Ms. <color=#8AAB4B>Yunguo</color>, has just completed the relocation to Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>! May <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> grow ever more prosperous and lively.
Breaking news! This just in — The Parade Info Hub has observed what appears to be <style=Highlight>some fluorite object</style> rapidly approaching <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>—
Breaking news! This just in — The Parade Info Hub has observed a <style=Highlight>glowing meteor</style> gracefully flying toward Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>—
It's my pleasure to be your host. From now on, Tata and I will bring you the latest news and updates from the Starsea.
{短暂停} What?! It's already made planetfall? C-Could it be...

A new Neighbor, Ms. <color=#8AAB4B>Frostia</color>, has just completed the relocation to Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>! May <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> grow ever more prosperous and lively.
It is <style=Highlight>{todaydate}</style>. Good afternoon, everyone! Welcome to Miracle Parade: Shortwave News Buzz~
It is <style=Highlight>{todaydate}</style>. Good evening, everyone! Welcome to Miracle Parade: Shortwave News Buzz~
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style> has completed further upgrade of their home on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>. Let's congratulate them~!

The <style=Highlight>Omni-Gallery</style> that provides ecological research services has been completed and is now open on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>. Let's celebrate this achievement!
Well then, that's all for today's fun buzzes! I trust that you'll get double the good fortune on Tuesday. Looking forward to seeing you all tomorrow. Ta-la~!
It is <style=Highlight>{todaydate}</style>. Good morning, everyone! Welcome to Miracle Parade: Shortwave News Buzz~
Parade Station is honored to share this encounter with the meteor shower with our viewers.
Mhm, this is a wondrous place perfect for me to blend in seamlessly! <style=SizeSmall>Could it be that, I really have a natural talent for becoming an exhibit?!</style>
According to the latest update from ecologists, traces of a previously undocumented new species have been discovered along the shores of Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>.
Well then, that's all for today's fun buzzes. Monday's hustle and bustle will soon be behind us, and I'm looking forward to seeing you all tomorrow. Ta-la~!
The <style=Highlight>Giftarium zone</style> of the <style=Highlight>Omni-Gallery</style> is now open. We hope you'll find a gift you love inside.
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves fishing: "I was absolutely convinced there were only grass carp in the river, but right after saying that, I started catching nothing but black tilapia."
A house that looks like a hat I could wear, how interesting! <style=SizeSmall>Technically, if I did a handstand on the roof, that would count as wearing it, right?</style>
And now, a special update from the ecologists: a previously undocumented species has been spotted on the shores of Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>.
I thought diving could be a good way of capturing them, but after learning that I can only float on water... <style=SizeSmall>I'm done with getting bounced around like a ball by fish again...</style>
Things that are not wood and fall from trees when you chop... <style=SizeSmall>Th-They don't mean me napping on the branch, right?!</style>
I've been intensively training in sprints, marathons, long jumps, and high jumps. This time, I'll surely keep up with the new creature... <style=SizeSmall>Probably?...</style>
And now for our second buzz of the day.
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves growing grass: "The wildgrass I planted in front of the house suddenly started growing like crazy, and then... my planet turned into a giant marimo!"
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves logging: "While chopping down a tree, I got bonked on the head by a strange object. Turns out, trees drop more than just wood!"
Breaking news! The Parade Info Hub has observed...
Looks like many Neighbors have completed their move to <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>. Let's celebrate <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>'s prosperity together~!
The <style=Highlight>meteor shower</style> is coming tomorrow, and Parade Station is just as thrilled as all of you~!
And now for today's Shortwave news buzz.

I know what this pretty house is made of! It's the kind that can bounce you up when you jump on it, right into the sky! <style=SizeSmall>I-I haven't been getting onto people's roofs! I swear...!</style>
According to the latest update from ecologists, traces of a previously undocumented new species have been discovered on the land of Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>.
I think the best way to deal with this is to grab an insect net...{短暂停} and put it on myself. <style=SizeSmall>Mhm~ I have a brilliant mind indeed.</style>
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves beachcombing: "I went to collect sea urchins on the beach today, but turns out, they ran way faster...!"
And now for the last buzz of the day.
The <style=Highlight>Ecohouse</style> that provides ecological settlement services has been completed and is now open on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>. Let's celebrate this achievement!
Looks like I'll have to move up my plan to disguise myself as fruit in the tree in order to observe this new land creature...
Well then, that's all for today's fun buzzes! I hope everyone enjoys the first day of the weekend to the absolute fullest! Ta-la~!
<style=Highlight><style=SizeBig>We wish you a very Happy Birthday!</style></style>
It is <style=Highlight>{todaydate}</style>. Good afternoon, everyone! Welcome to Miracle Parade: Shortwave News Buzz~
And now for some exciting news: The <style=Highlight>Faintglow House</style> on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has been completed! Let's give our warm congratulations!
It's an Omni-Gallery that contains omni-things... so can I sneak in and become an exhibit myself? <style=SizeSmall>I-I'm kidding... Tata is not for sale!</style>
It is <style=Highlight>{todaydate}</style>. Welcome to the Late Night Special of Miracle Parade: Shortwave News Buzz! It's a pleasant surprise to have you here with us.
You can see it emitting a bright light in the photo — Oh? Turns out the photo I secretly took was just overexposed...
If I jump into the water, would I attract the new species? <style=SizeSmall>I'll wear a life jacket before I do, so don't worry!</style>
Ecologists have confirmed that the unusual markings recently found in the waters of Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> are traces of a new species.
Even a speedster like me can't keep up with a sea urchin— <style=SizeSmall>So the secret to being fast is... growing spikes?!</style>
Now for the headline of the day— To <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, who gave one hundred-twenty percent for the prosperity of <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>...
Put me in a giant basket of flowers and send me as the most magnificent and majestic housewarming gift! <style=SizeSmall>I-I'm just kidding...</style>
And now, a special update from the ecologists: a previously undocumented species has been spotted in the waters of Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>.
Well then, that's all for today's fun buzzes! Even though it's the last day of the weekend, I still hope everyone makes the most of their remaining free time. Ta-la~!
And now for today's Shortwave news buzz.
The <style=Highlight>Luminescent Stone House</style> on <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> star is now complete.
It's a spectacular sight of stars being drawn to the planet. Parade Station will be covering this wonderful phenomenon live. Stay tuned~
The <style=Highlight>meteor shower</style> is almost here, and Parade Station is just as excited as you~!
And now for some exciting news: The <style=Highlight>Mushi no Mori House</style> on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has been completed! Let's give our warm congratulations!
Ecologists have confirmed that the unusual markings recently found along the shores of Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> are traces of a new species.

I'm confident my head can go head-to-head with that new creature on the beach.
<style=SizeSmall>Though I can't guarantee I'll win...</style>
Well then, that's all for today's fun buzzes. One more day to go until Friday before the weekend! I wish you all a bounty of good vibes as the weekend approaches. Ta-la~!
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style> has completed the initial upgrade of their home on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>. Let's congratulate them~!
A new species?! I'll put on my pot lid helmet and head to the beach for a face-off!
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves mining: "Thought burying precious gems in the soil would yield even more gems, but nothing actually happened."
As much as I'd love to jump in the water and become fish bait, this new creature doesn't seem interested in taking a bite... <style=SizeSmall>Wait, what am I saying?!</style>

Breaking news! It's <style=Highlight>{todaydate}</style>. A <style=Highlight>meteor shower</style> will appear in the night sky of <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> in just <style=Highlight>two days</style>!
And now for some exciting news: The <style=Highlight>Floofy House</style> on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has been completed! Let's give our warm congratulations!
The staff at the Omni-Gallery wouldn't stop visitors from jumping into the aquarium tanks to swim with the fish, right? <style=SizeSmall>A-Asking for a friend...</style>
<style=Highlight>Glenn's Goods</style>, a one-stop shop for all your needs, has been completed and is now open on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>. Let's celebrate this achievement!
Here's a submission about insects... Tala?
Breaking news! It's <style=Highlight>{todaydate}</style>. A <style=Highlight>meteor shower</style> is expected to appear in the night sky above <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> today.
And now for some exciting news: The <style=Highlight>Yakraft House</style> on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has been completed! Let's give our warm congratulations!
And I won't be leaving the studio for quite a while from now on. <style=SizeSmall>N-No, it's not because I'm preparing to battle the new species...</style>
Breaking news! A <style=Highlight>meteor shower</style> will light up <style=PlayerName>{homestar}'s</style> night sky on {流星雨开启时间}... A <style=Highlight>meteor shower</style>?

Breaking news! It's <style=Highlight>{todaydate}</style>. A <style=Highlight>meteor shower</style> is expected to appear in the night sky of <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> <style=Highlight>tomorrow</style>!
And now for today's Shortwave news buzz.
A cozy cabin with the pleasant smell of wood... it feels just like being in a forest. <style=SizeSmall>It must be "food paradise" for beetles too, huh?</style>
I can smell it, the scent of bamboo and apples, just from looking at the picture! <style=SizeSmall>It won't do any harm to take a bite, right?</style>
According to the latest update from ecologists, traces of a previously undocumented new species have been discovered in the waters of Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>.
Based on my experience, it's also possible to... catch nothing but mosquitofish. <style=SizeSmall>Well, at least it's better than... getting "skunked."</style>
Oh?! Look at all those things flying toward <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>!
Ecologists have confirmed that the unusual markings recently found on land of Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> are traces of a new species.
And now, a special update from the ecologists: a previously undocumented species has been spotted on the land of Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>.
Looking forward to celebrating with you again on this day next year. Ta-la!
And now for some exciting news: The <style=Highlight>Bamboo Harvest House</style> on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has been completed! Let's give our warm congratulations!
Well then, that's all for today's fun buzzes! Tomorrow marks the start of the weekend — With that to look forward to, I hope everyone's in good spirits. Ta-la~!
I know exactly what you mean. When I slack on getting a haircut, I turn into a marimo, too. <style=SizeSmall>Wait, maybe that's not the best comparison?</style>
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style> has completed the final upgrade of their home on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>. Let's congratulate them~!
Tata's ready to go on a shopping spree! <style=SizeSmall>...But my wallet isn't.</style>
Put me inside a plant pot and send me as a house decoration! <style=SizeSmall>I-I'm just kidding...</style>
And now for today's Shortwave news buzz.

I heard they can grant almost any request, as long as it's not too outrageous. So, if I asked for a boot-shaped bathtub made of pure gold...
<style=SizeSmall>I'm joking! Please don't include that in the broadcast...</style>
Well then, that's all for today's fun buzzes. I trust good fortune will return "threefold" on Wednesday! Looking forward to seeing you all tomorrow. Ta-la~!
Similarly, we can conclude that burying Dough in the ground won't grow you a Dough tree either. <style=SizeSmall>Can confirm from my personal experience, mm...</style>
It is <style=Highlight>{todaydate}</style>. Good day, everyone! Welcome to Miracle Parade: Shortwave News Buzz~
Wrap me up in a bouquet and send me as a housewarming gift! <style=SizeSmall>I-I'm just kidding...</style>
How wonderful that the camera captured that gentle Faintglow perfectly! <style=SizeSmall>The overexposed photos in the camera must have been my imagination.</style>

The <style=Highlight>Insectarium</style> section of the <style=Highlight>Omni-Gallery</style>, designed for our insect inhabitants, has been completed and is now open for visitors on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>. Let's celebrate this achievement!
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves shopping: "Unable to predict which crops would sell for higher prices tomorrow, I ended up planting everything."
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves shopping: "I found a place with lucky draws and won a bunch of Dough. I'm on my way, financial independence!"
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves fishing: "After breaking my fishing line several times at a lake on the hills, I finally caught a fish I'd ever seen before."
So it appears the secret to growing special crops is...{短暂停} love! <style=SizeSmall>I can never grow pretty things, does that mean...</style>
Here's a submission from a crafty Neighbor: "When inspiration strikes, I can whip up an Inspo Card just like that!"
So my never being able to draw an Inspo Card is because of... runaway inspiration?!
I learned something new! I'll try to make the peace sign when taking photos— <style=SizeSmall>Eh? Wait... I, I don't think I can?</style>

A new Neighbor, Mr. <color=#8AAB4B>Msafiri</color>, has just completed the relocation to Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>! May <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> grow ever more prosperous and lively.
You can see it emitting a bright light in the photo — Oh? Turns out the photo I secretly took was just overexposed...
Ecologists have confirmed that traces of a previously undocumented new species have been discovered along the shores of Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>.

On these expeditions, there's a chance for you to run into mysterious Neighbors who have lost their way! <style=SizeSmall>Or maybe find some odds and ends that I've carelessly dropped, ahem...</style>
Nourished by the planet's vitality, I wonder what changes await Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>? How exciting!
And now for some exciting news: The Luca Arbor on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has grown to Level 2! Let's celebrate this moment!
Nourished by the planet's vitality, I wonder what changes await Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>? How exciting!
Nourished by the planet's vitality, I wonder what changes await Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>? How exciting!
Nourished by the planet's vitality, I wonder what changes await Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>? How exciting!
Nourished by the planet's vitality, I wonder what changes await Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>? How exciting!
Nourished by the planet's vitality, I wonder what changes await Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>? How exciting!
That's actually not a bad idea. Tata will take note and learn from this. <style=SizeSmall>Huh wait... I don't think there's even space left for me to stand on my Planette?!</style>
Sounds like that legend about some undiscovered creature... But, maybe it's really just a grumpy crab?
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves farming: "The crops I've carefully tended grew into something completely unexpected. What a delightful surprise!"
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves cooking: "When cooking, try different ingredient combinations. You might discover something unexpected."
Breaking news! This just in — The Parade Info Hub has observed a <style=Highlight>perfectly shaped tumbleweed</style> riding the wind toward Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>—
{短暂停} What?! It's already made planetfall? C-Could it be...
And now for some exciting news: The <style=Highlight>Fluorite House</style> on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has been completed! Let's give our warm congratulations!
Visit Islets and make new discoveries! <style=Highlight>Starsea Exploration</style> is now available from Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>. Let's celebrate this achievement!
I'm going to change into my new clothes and make more friends at the Galactic Bazaar! <style=SizeSmall>Wait... I-I think, I don't have any new clothes at all?!</style>
Nourished by the planet's vitality, I wonder what changes await Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>? How exciting!
And now for some exciting news: The Luca Arbor on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has grown to Level 3! Let's celebrate this moment!
Nourished by the planet's vitality, I wonder what changes await Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>? How exciting!
And now for some exciting news: The Luca Arbor on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has grown to Level 4! Let's celebrate this moment!
And now for some exciting news: The Luca Arbor on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has grown to Level 5! Let's celebrate this moment!
Nourished by the planet's vitality, I wonder what changes await Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>? How exciting!
And now for some exciting news: The Luca Arbor on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has grown to Level 6! Let's celebrate this moment!
And now for some exciting news: The Luca Arbor on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has grown to Level 7! Let's celebrate this moment!
Nourished by the planet's vitality, I wonder what changes await Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>? How exciting!
And now for some exciting news: The Luca Arbor on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has grown to Level 8! Let's celebrate this moment!
And now for some exciting news: The Luca Arbor on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has grown to Level 9! Let's celebrate this moment!
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves taking walks: "While walking on the beach, I can't help but feel like I'm about to enter combat with something..."
I guess that's one way to get richer. I shall study and practice this method religiously. <style=SizeSmall>Hold on... what are the conditions to enter the draw again?</style>
Phew, at least it wasn't one of those scary fish monsters— <style=SizeSmall>But I guess catching a fish monster is pretty cool too?</style>
So the reason my cooking skills have not improved is because... I couldn't find enough different ingredients?!
Here's a submission from a Neighbor who loves photography: "Try different reactions and expressions when taking photos. You might just capture the golden moment!"
You'll find unexpected new species in unexpected places. I'm quite experienced in this matter. <style=SizeSmall>Experienced in the theories, that is...</style>
The well-known social hub, <style=Highlight>Galactic Bazaar</style>, is now accessible from Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>. Let's celebrate this achievement!
And now for some exciting news: The Luca Arbor on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has grown to Level 1! Let's celebrate this moment!
And now for some exciting news: The Luca Arbor on Planet <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> has reached its final stage of growth! Let's celebrate this moment!
And now... Wait, that's all for today's broadcast?!
